artefact.overview: To provide gaming machines eg fruit machines in a club in Scotland, you need to get a permit from your local authority
artefact.licence_short_description: Apply to your local authority to get a permit to provide gaming machines in a club in Scotland.
artefact.licence_overview:
If you operate a members' club, miners' welfare institute or a commercial club, you need a club machine permit in order to provide up to three gaming machines for use (each of which must fall within category B, C or D).

##How to apply
You need to apply for a permit from the Licensing Board of your local authority. Your application should be accompanied by the appropriate fee.
